summary: This batch represents work across multiple teams focusing on OTP (One-Time Purchase) checkout implementation, payment system improvements, and UI/UX enhancements. Major efforts include cart de-duplication for OTP checkout, fixing duplicate API calls in payment components, and implementing comprehensive OTP checkout flows with proper pricing communication. Several teams are working on funnel improvements, reactivation features, and addressing technical debt through bug fixes and test automation.

decisions.what: Implement cart de-duplication for OTP checkout using single cart ID per session with patching instead of creating duplicates
decisions.rationale: Prevent multiple cart IDs and duplicated orders while not blocking order creation

decisions.what: Remove duplicate payment-change-status API calls by consolidating hook usage
decisions.rationale: Fix duplicate API requests caused by both PaymentMethodStatus and PaymentStatus components calling usePaymentChangeStatus() hook
Required to get correct price-sets for OTP orders

decisions.what: Make CTAs on modals sticky for OTP experience
decisions.rationale: Improve user experience by keeping CTAs visible at all times

decisions.what: Won't implement SNS discount display in OTP checkout
decisions.rationale: Issue resolved by other VMSU work

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) Checkout Implementation
initiatives.description: Complete implementation of one-time purchase checkout flow including cart management, pricing communication, order creation, and SFMC integration

initiatives.name: Payment System Improvements
initiatives.description: Fix duplicate API calls, improve error handling, and enhance payment component architecture

initiatives.name: Reactivation Dashboard with Vouchers
initiatives.description: Implement reactivation functionality with voucher support including E2E test coverage

initiatives.name: Funnel Navigation Improvements
initiatives.description: Enhance funnel experience by displaying previous meal selections and improving navigation flow

initiatives.name: Premium Upgrade Modal (Milestone 0)
initiatives.description: Create UI for modal comparing Premium and Classic tiers to help customers understand value proposition

initiatives.name: Product Family Roll-out
initiatives.description: Add new product families to static configuration and global config

blockers.description: Cart de-duplication hook blocked due to missing ambassador config
blockers.impact: OTP cart creation session management delayed until PR merged

blockers.description: SFMC events implementation waiting on event details from Tyler
blockers.impact: CRM email triggers for OTP-related events cannot be configured

technical_patterns.pattern: Hook consolidation to prevent duplicate API calls
technical_patterns.context: Removing duplicate usePaymentChangeStatus() hook calls from multiple components to eliminate redundant API requests

technical_patterns.pattern: Cart patching instead of creation for session management
technical_patterns.context: OTP checkout uses single cart ID per session with PATCH operations rather than creating new carts for each update
Multiple features using feature flags (tpt_reactivation_page, tpt_price_update_on_portion_change, OTP flags) for controlled rollouts
UI pattern to keep call-to-action buttons visible at all times in modal interfaces
Sending checkoutType in API payload to ensure correct pricing configuration is retrieved
Fixing payment error handling by matching error structure from /order/legacy/process endpoint with checkoutErrorDetection logic

technical_patterns.pattern: E2E test maintenance for feature flags
technical_patterns.context: Updating E2E tests to handle new OTP experience elements when feature flags are enabled
Using Honeycomb dashboards to identify inconsistencies in payment method checkout submissions

work_themes: Payment system optimization and bug fixes
UI/UX improvements for checkout and reactivation flows
KTLO (Keep The Lights On) maintenance tasks

dependencies.context: Cart de-duplication feature blocked until ambassador configuration PR is merged
Waiting on event specifications from CRM team to implement SFMC integration
Order creation depends on successful cart creation and session management
Test scripts need updates when OTP feature flags are enabled on test environments
Price update on portion change needs to account for feature flag in addition to experiment variations
Product card and PDP offers depend on discount communication service fields
